version_description:
• Fixes an issue related to the Recorder in-app purchase
• Fixes an application freeze that could occur while accessing the Studio
• General reliability improvements

• Fixes an issue related to the Recorder in-app purchase
• Fixes an application freeze that could occur while accessing the Studio
• General reliability improvements

- Fixes an issues with the tempo not saved in the projects
- Addresses minor issues related to Audiobus compatibility
- Fixed an issue that caused the app to crash saving recording with emoticons
- Improved tooltips
- Use iCloud to transfer in-app purchases between the 4 main VocaLive versions
- Now compatible with Audiobus on iOS8

- Fixes an issues with the tempo not saved in the projects
- Addresses minor issues related to Audiobus compatibility
- Fixed an issue that caused the app to crash saving recording with emoticons
- Improved tooltips
- Use iCloud to transfer in-app purchases between the 4 main VocaLive versions
- Now compatible with Audiobus on iOS8

- Mic Room microphone modeling – Now “re-mike” your input microphone to sound like one of 20 highly coveted professional studio microphones
- Simultaneous Multi-track recording – record up to 8 audio tracks simultaneously
- 4-Track Looper – Get creative with looping with the new integrated 4-track looper
- 4 available effects processor slots in gear chain

- Mic Room microphone modeling – Now “re-mike” your input microphone to sound like one of 20 highly coveted professional studio microphones
- Simultaneous Multi-track recording – record up to 8 audio tracks simultaneously
- 4-Track Looper – Get creative with looping with the new integrated 4-track looper
- 4 available effects processor slots in gear chain

- Added in-app purchases sharing from Mic Room to VocaLive
- Fixed compatibility with certain USB audio / MIDI peripherals
- General reliability improvements

- Added in-app purchases sharing from Mic Room to VocaLive
- Fixed compatibility with certain USB audio / MIDI peripherals
- General reliability improvements

- NEW Live Mode offers an optimized interface for live performance, keeping essential parameters easily visible
- iRig Stomp I/O integration for effortless setup with IK’s new interface/controller. Control presets, effects and functions with the feel of a traditional pedalboard
- Expanded 2-track recorder now included free
- General reliability improvements

- NEW Live Mode offers an optimized interface for live performance, keeping essential parameters easily visible
- iRig Stomp I/O integration for effortless setup with IK’s new interface/controller. Control presets, effects and functions with the feel of a traditional pedalboard
- Expanded 2-track recorder now included free
- General reliability improvements

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

-General reliability & security improvements
